Establishing Our 20 1 9 Baseline
In 2020, we collected 2019 data on energy and water consumption from all eight manufacturing sites. Our 2019 Scope 1 and 
Scope 2 greenhouse gas emission inventory data was sourced directly from utility providers. In shared tenant properties where 
direct data was unavailable, industry standards were applied as estimates to determine total impact. 
This 2019 data establishes our base year against which future reporting disclosures will be compared.
